attributes.action: I want you to change the way MP’s are addressed.
attributes.background: I feel MP’s should be addressed as ‘dis-honourable’ member for ******* etc  and not as ‘right honourable’ . This would more fairly reflect the national feeling and more importantly more accurately describe a majority of MP’s .

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the title "Right Honourable" is given to Privy Councillors when they are appointed to the Privy Council. It isn't given to all MPs and it isn't given by Parliament, so Parliament can't take it away. In any case, we can't accept petitions asking for an honour to be taken away from someone.
